cyclone.name: IDALIA
cyclone.current_location: about 195 miles SW of Tampa, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then north-northeast with a track toward Florida’s Big Bend and later along the GA/SC coasts

weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Middle of Longboat Key northward to Indian Pass, including Tampa Bay; Storm Surge Warning: Englewood northward to Indian Pass, including Tampa Bay
weather_observation.impacted_coast: West-central Florida coast including Tampa Bay and Big Bend
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (39–73 mph) very likely at the port with a small chance of hurricane-force gusts tonight into early Wednesday.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Storm surge in Tampa Bay forecast 4–6 ft above ground if peak surge coincides with high tide.
weather_observation.rainfall: 4–8 inches of rain with locally higher amounts could cause flash and urban flooding around the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf/rip currents and a few tornadoes possible along the west-central Florida coast.
